title: Dermoscopy combined with reflectance confocal microscopy for basal cell carcinoma diagnosis
details: X Deng, Z Guo, P Wang, Y Lu, W Wu - Archives of Dermatological Research, 2025
abstract: Purpose To investigate the characteristic manifestations of basal cell carcinoma (BCC) under dermoscopy and reflectance confocal microscopy (RCM) and explore the diagnostic value of dermoscopy combined with RCM for BCC. Methods A cohort …
